column5: And a Very Happy, Healthy and Propserous year to you and your family Lew. Hopefully 2007 will find us able to share a boat tying into one of those 50+ girls (inches not years)  And to the rest of the OFC a VERY Happy New year to all !
Our family would like to wish everyone a HAPPY NEW YEAR  Please be safe over the holidays.  Best regards, Sam, Laurie, Andrew and Hunter.
Best wishes  From eddyk: Too funny
Happy New Years to you too Lew.....
Happy new year OFC'ers/
From my family to your's, Happy New Year and all the best in 2007 !!
Same to you & yours Lew!
All the best to you and your family Lew! I hope 2007 is a slimey one!
All the best to you and yours too Lew. May your 2007 be your best ever..
Thanks Lew and the same back at ya, with lots of PB's in 07...
And a very Happy New Year to you and your family Lew    Don
Thanks Lew.  Best wishes for 2007 to all the OFNCers...  Mike
Happy New Year to you as well and Diane and Sheri.  Jim
Happy New Year to all ... and a wish for a PB of your favorite fish in 2007
happy new year to your family from ours lew, shawn&julie and our little fishergirl in training  angelina
And the same to you and yours Lew,and may there be many of them!  But whats with the Red X sig.?
Happy New Year to your family as well Lew. Best wishes to all for 2007! Happy New Year everyone!
Happy New Years Lew. All the best to you in the New Year.  Mike

Mr. Knighton, you have yourself a great new year also, and also Diane, and Sheri.(goes without saying, but I said it anyways). Take care now.  And to everyone else who reads or responds to this post, best wishes for the new year, one and all.
Right back atcha Lew.  Hopy you and you family have a super year.  Joey & Tybo
Lew, Ill call you at midnight. Oh I forgot . We will both be asleep by 10.
Lew all the best to you and your fam...  All the best in 07  hope to  with you again!

Same to you Lew, and may the next Muskie you catch in the new year pull you around the lake for an hour and you won't have a tape long enough to measure it  . Make sure you have a camera, I'd like to see it   Have a good one Lew.
Lew, Happy New Year to you, Diane and Sheri. Good health and good times to come my friend.
Happy New Year Lew,hope you have agood one.and to the rest of you too,may you all be well in the NewYear.  Steve
Happy New Years to you Lew, and everyone else at OFC! May all your lures get fresh teeth marks this year  !
Happy New Year to you and yours Lew!  Whopper
Have a great new years.  Pam
Happy New Year to everyone and hope everyone cathes more fish this year. Hopefully i will.    jordan
